item.title: How to install kubernetes on ubuntu 20.04 with kubeadm
item.description: How to install kubernetes on ubuntu 20.04 Kubernetes is new linux os at nowadays. This is manually install kubernetes on ubuntu 20.04 with kubeadm. I have 3 proxmox ve servers. then I plan to install 3 ubuntu virtual machines on eache proxmox ve server. No. Name OS IP ADDRESS 01 ubuntu-k8s-master ubuntu 20.04 LTS 192.168.11.71 02 ubuntu-k8s-node01 ubuntu 20.04 LTS 192.168.11.72 03 ubuntu-k8s-node02 ubuntu 20.04 LTS 192.168.11.73 Here is my plan to install kubernetes:

item.title: Debian or Ubuntu Chinese Language Support
item.description: Ubuntu Chinese Language Support 编辑/etc/environment如下: 1 vi /etc/environment 添加如下: 1 2 3 4 LC_ALL="en_US.UTF-8" LANG="zh_CN.UTF-8" UNZIP='-O CP936" ZIPINFO="-O CP936" 重新生成语言设置 1 2 sudo locale-gen en_US en_US.UTF-8 zh_CN zh_CN.UTF-8 sudo dpkg-reconfigure locales 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8

item.title: How to Remove LC_CTYPE Error
item.description: 1 2 3 4 apt-get autoremove export LC_ALL=en_US.UTF-8 echo "en_US.UTF-8 UTF-8" >> /etc/locale.gen locale-gen
